summary: My first ever weapon for Skyrim, and also my first attempt at 3D modelling! Hope you like it :)
descriptionHtml:
So this is a sword I made, completely from scratch, using Blender and GIMP. It's actually the first thing I ever 3D modelled :) I'm no expert at modelling or texturing by any means, but I think it's pretty good for my first attempt, and I hope you guys think so too. The sword itself also has a unique enchantment (I'll let you find out for yourselves what it is) and can't be crafted, but it can be found in a dungeon :) I won't tell you where though, so you'll have to do some exploring. But I'll give you a clue where to look: the sword Hephaestus was once wielded by a mighty dragon priest! :) The sword can also be tempered, but not un-enchanted, so it really is unique ;)

Installation: Just install normally via NMM, or, manually extract the esp to your data folder, and merge the meshes, textures and scripts folders with the ones in your data folder.

Compatibility: There should be no compatibility issues with other mods.

Hope you like my first ever attempt at making a sword! :)
author: simsim899
